resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The ideal gas laws</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die idealen Gasgesetze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les lois idéales de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As leis ideais do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le leggi ideali del gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ιδανικοί αέριο νόμοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los leyes ideales del gas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An simulation of the ideal gas law where the user can control parameters of temperature, volume and number of gas particles</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ideal gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation des idealen Gasgesetzes, in dem 
der Benutzer Parameter der Temperatur, des Datenträgers und der Zahl 
der Gaspartikel steuern kann</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation de la loi idéale de gaz où 
l'utilisateur peut contrôler des paramètres de la température, de 
volume et de nombre de particules de gaz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação da lei ideal do gás onde o 
usuário pode controlar parâmetros da temperatura, do volume e do 
número de partículas do gás</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione della legge ideale del gas dove 
l'utente può gestire i parametri della temperatura, del volume e del 
numero di particelle del gas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση του ιδανικού αέριο νόμου όπου ο 
χρήστης μπορεί να ελέγξει τις παραμέτρους της θερμοκρασίας, της 
έντασης του ήχου και του αριθμού αέριο μορίων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación de la ley ideal del gas donde el 
utilizador puede controlar parámetros de la temperatura, del volumen 
y del número de las partículas del gas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ideales Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz idéal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gás ideal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gas ideale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμοκρασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιδανικό αέριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gas ideal</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>

version:3.0

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

          </contribute>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>

                <string language="en">Chemical phenomena</string>

      </lom>
